risks.name: Supply chain vulnerability
risks.mechanism: 45% semiconductor dependency on China → geopolitical tensions → critical component shortage → production/defense impact
risks.mitigation: EU Chips Act participation, supplier diversification, strategic stockpiling
risks.voi_hint: Monitor Taiwan Strait tensions, EU-China relations

risks.name: Defense spending shortfall
risks.mechanism: Italy fails to meet NATO 2% target → capability gaps worsen → alliance burden-sharing tensions

risks.name: Technology sovereignty erosion
risks.mechanism: Insufficient R&D investment → foreign supplier dependence → competitiveness loss
risks.note: Research collaboration (3.38%) not a driver - funding/investment is

risks.name: China research collaboration risk
risks.mechanism: Normal academic exchange (3.38%) → standard knowledge sharing → minimal technology transfer
risks.assessment: NOT A SIGNIFICANT RISK - Standard EU-China academic exchange
risks.mitigation: Existing EU research security frameworks sufficient

risks.name: Leonardo commercial exposure
risks.mechanism: Helicopter sales to China → commercial presence → potential technology exposure

risks.name: Cyber vulnerability
risks.mechanism: Insufficient cyber investment → infrastructure exposure → successful attacks

risks.name: Brain drain
risks.mechanism: Limited opportunities → talent emigration → innovation decline
risks.note: Not related to China collaboration which is at normal levels

key_findings.1: Primary risk is SUPPLY CHAIN (45% semiconductors), not research
key_findings.2: Research collaboration at 3.38% is NORMAL for EU
key_findings.3: No evidence of systematic technology transfer through academia
key_findings.4: Leonardo exposure is commercial (helicopters), not research-based

immediate: Maintain current research frameworks (no restrictions needed)
long_term: Build strategic autonomy in critical sectors
Maintain open research with standard safeguards

nato_specific_risks.name: Mediterranean instability spillover
nato_specific_risks.mechanism: Regional conflicts → migration pressure → resource diversion → NATO southern flank impact

nato_specific_risks.name: Supply chain impact on NATO systems
nato_specific_risks.mechanism: Semiconductor shortage → F-35/other system production delays → capability gaps
nato_specific_risks.note: Affects all NATO allies, not Italy-specific
